Text: The following is an episode list for "The Ricky Gervais Show", which is credited as the most downloaded podcast ever, with "nearly 8 million" downloads according to the BBC.

1: List of The Ricky Gervais Show episodes

<Text: List of The Ricky Gervais Show episodes:  The series stars Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant of "The Office" and "Extras" fame, as well as Karl Pilkington.>
